sentences.sContent: The government of luxembourg however has recently grown fed up with wastrel youths applying for unemployment benefits while still living with their parents.
sentences.sContent_eng: The government of luxembourg however has recently grown fed up with wastrel youths applying for unemployment benefits while still living with their parents.
sentences.sCn: 然而在卢森堡，政府对那些与父母同住又来领救济金无所事事的年轻人越来越忍无可忍。

words.tran: 浪费的，不经济的；奢侈的
[环境] 废品；挥霍者，浪费者
